release_notes.en-US: Initial version of Sensitive Attachment Guard To start with the add-on, you may visit the tutorial or follow the steps below 1. Install add-on 2. Download the template file to create your document 3. Update the sensitive content to apply confidential characters style 4. Save the document and send it as normal 5. A dialog would prompt to warn you sensitive content is sending to unknown recipient(s)
